channel.title: Server help is it any help?
channel.description:
i was curios to see how many posts went unreplied because i have been waiting 2 days for one of mine to be replied to in server help and i have gotten 7 views on the other hand my friend made a post on server downloads like 2 hours ago it has over 7 replies or something i dont know
what im getting at is that there are OVER 1129 PAGES OF UN REPLIED TOPICS IN SERVER HELP
now me doing quick math there are like 5597 pages in that frikken thing thats about one fifth of the amout of messages go un answered
now dont get me wrong im not trying to make people mad at the forums its just that these forums are only being used for server downloads apparently
so please people lets try to get some server help going here moparscape is about learning not just gaming

item.title: Server help is it any help?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

ChaosPkers:

the only person i see post there lately is marcbob and hes most of the time wrong

No offence but this made my day :D.
On-Topic:
Yeah i think we need some good coders to help out in the server help section, Although as Demise stated half of them are delta noobs that quit very quickly

Read full topic

item.title: Server help is it any help?
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“no way agz, post:8, topic:333907”][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=430304.msg3161433#msg3161433 date=1269578638]
Only a few members will browse the help sections and answer questions. I go in there every so often and answer a few, but be patient. If the thread drops a few pages, repost it. Just because it is not answered immediately does not mean:

[ul]umm fuck you
[list]
[/quote]
im a huge faggot plz rape my face i love ape penis in my rectum lol[/quote]
lol why would u say that? lol
[/list][/ul]

Read full topic
item.source: Server help is it any help?

item.title: Server help is it any help?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Only a few members will browse the help sections and answer questions. I go in there every so often and answer a few, but be patient. If the thread drops a few pages, repost it. Just because it is not answered immediately does not mean:

[ul][li]You post it in the wrong section, multiple times, etc.[/li]
[li]It will never be answered[/li][/ul]

Read full topic

item.title: Server help is it any help?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

It sucks that only a handful of people go to the help section to answer questions. 68% of my posts are in the help section with only 2.5% being topics I started. Statistics are fun ^.^. So out of my total posts, 65.5% Of my posts have been in the help section helping people. (maybe 63% give or take random messages) At any rate, I’ve dedicated over half my posts to helping the Moparscape community. More people should be like me

No not really… I suck, but people should try to help out more. I see about 30 people in the help section helping. And thats actual help not 1 post that wasn’t even remotely close to being correct

Read full topic
item.source: Server help is it any help?

item.title: Server help is it any help?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

This is one of the best threads I’ve seen in a while. I’m getting back into RSPS now, so rather than hanging in the GD I’m probably going to get back in the Help section.

Read full topic
